title: Ticket #1514: condor_q -help should list -globus option
description:
condor_q takes an option "-globus", but this option is not listed when you do "condor_q -help".

I recommend you list it. Better yet, check to make sure the -help output lists all the options.

I would go ahead an commit the code myself, but I'm not quite sure how to do things with git. An alternative solution to this problem is "give Alain the 10 minutes instruction he needs to build and commit changes", and I'll do it myself. I'll accept either solution.
check_ins: 2010-Jul-20 12:10   Check-in [18595]: Added missing options for condor_q -help (#1514). (By Josh Slauson )
creator: roy
